document.full_text: the united states lifted import duties on european luxury foods on friday in return for a promise of bigger hormone-free beef sales to the european union, signaling an end to one of the trading powers' oldest disputes.
document.title: u.s. lifts sanctions in eu beef hormone row
lines_and_colors: the united states lifted import duties on european luxury foods on friday in return for a promise of bigger hormone-free beef sales to the european union, signaling an end to one of the trading powers' oldest disputes.
